award_labels.label: Fellow of the British Royal Society
award_labels.reasoning: Fellowship in the British Royal Society is a prestigious recognition of scientific achievement and contribution to the advancement of science.

award_labels.label: Fellow of the Swedish Academy of Engineering
award_labels.reasoning: Fellowship in the Swedish Academy of Engineering signifies significant contributions to the field of engineering and recognition by a respected international institution.

award_labels.label: Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)
award_labels.reasoning: IEEE Fellowship is a highly regarded recognition for technical achievements and contributions to the field of electrical and electronics engineering.

award_labels.label: Fellow of the Association for Computing Machinery (ACM)
award_labels.reasoning: ACM Fellowship recognizes outstanding accomplishments in computing and information technology, highlighting significant impact on the field.

award_labels.label: Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS)
award_labels.reasoning: AAAS Fellowship honors distinguished contributions to science and engineering, promoting scientific progress and innovation.

award_labels.label: Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences
award_labels.awarding_organization: American Academy of Arts and Sciences
award_labels.reasoning: Fellowship in the American Academy of Arts and Sciences recognizes exceptional scholarly and professional achievements across disciplines.

award_labels.label: Recognition by the Ministry of Youth & ICT
award_labels.reasoning: Recognition by a government ministry highlights significant contributions to youth development and information and communication technology.

award_labels.label: Award from the European Economic Association
award_labels.reasoning: Awards from the European Economic Association signify notable contributions to economic research and policy.

award_labels.label: Award from the CNRS
award_labels.reasoning: Recognition by the French National Centre for Scientific Research (CNRS) highlights significant contributions to scientific research and innovation.
